## 游玩视频

[点击下载视频](https://qicaiyun.sharepoint.cn/sites/aa/_layouts/15/download.aspx?UniqueId=bb0dcb84-9da8-4339-9201-40337ca6e742&Translate=false&tempauth=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJub25lIn0..ank0S2g2dGN4WnVGOGowN1J0QlY4SGFsVTgwOXJGSWZHUVNVWkt2bFBLTT0&ApiVersion=2.0)

## 使用方法

把压缩包里的文件解压到以下路径

```
C:\Users\86198\AppData\Local\Packages\Microsoft.MinecraftUWP_8wekyb3d8bbwe\LocalState\premium_cache\world_templates
```

或者

```
C:\Users\86198\AppData\Local\Packages\Microsoft.MinecraftUWP_8wekyb3d8bbwe\LocalState\games\com.mojang\world_templates
```

（解压记得保留压缩包原本的文件夹）

然后重启游戏就可以了

## 下载链接

[点这里下载https://cloud.06dn.com/s/vKDQue](https://cloud.06dn.com/s/vKDQue)
